    • filter

      public void filter()
      Called when the user clicks the filter button. Filter the submission records according to the filter. The charts will also be updated.

    • filterSubmissions

      public List<Submission> filterSubmissions(String courseFilter, String examFilter, String studentFilter)
      Retrieve submission records from the database.
      Parameters:
      courseFilter - the filter for course.
      examFilter - the filter for exam.
      studentFilter - the filter for student.
      Returns:
      a list of records matches the filter.
